title: UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: May 6, 2018 / 2:04 PM / in 28 minutes UPDATE 3-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 3 Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles matches on Sunday .. Seeds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 Rafael Nadal (ESP) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 2 Alexander Zverev (GER) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 3 Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 4 Juan Martin del Potro (ARG) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 5 Dominic Thiem (AUT) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 6 Kevin Anderson (RSA) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 7 John Isner (USA) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 8 David Goffin (BEL) 2nd to play (start 08:00) 1st won (Bye) 9 Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) 1st to play Borna Coric (CRO) (start 08:00) 10 Novak Djokovic (SRB) 1st to play Kei Nishikori (JPN) (start 14:00) 11 Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) 1st to play Jared Donaldson (USA) (start 08:00) 12 Jack Sock (USA) 1st to play Pablo Cuevas (URU) (start 08:00) 13 Diego Schwartzman (ARG) 1st to play Adrian Mannarino (FRA) (start 10:00) 14 Tomas Berdych (CZE) 1st lost Richard Gasquet (FRA) 6-4 6-2 15 Lucas Pouille (FRA) 1st to play Benoit Paire (FRA) (start 10:00) 16 Fabio Fognini (ITA) 1st to play Leonardo Mayer (ARG) (start 08:00) (Note : all times are GMT)
